entry.title: SurfaceFlinger
entry.content:
Prints of SERVICE SurfaceFlinger 

adb shell dumpsys SurfaceFlinger

Find more information about [dumpsys] (https://source.android.com/devices/tech/input/dumpsys.html)

Prints information about last 128 frames displayed in specific window 

dumpsys SurfaceFlinger --latency [window name]

You can see how chromium.org utilize this tool to get window information. Please check [external/chromium_org/build/android/pylib/surface_stats_collector.py] (https://android.googlesource.com/platform/external/chromium_org/+/d0247b1/build/android/pylib/perf/surface_stats_collector.py#215)

Observe composite rate in logcat 

adb shell service call SurfaceFlinger 1001 i32 1

Force using SurfaceFlinger as compositor 

adb shell service call SurfaceFlinger 1008 i32 1
